se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.physics
Interface PhysicsBody

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhysicsBodyImpl
public interface PhysicsBody

A PhysicsBody represents an instance of a simulated physics entity.

See Also:
Body

getDimensions

com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getDimensions()
Returns the dimensions of the the box surrounding the body. For example: If the body is in the shape of a circle with the radius 2 this method returns the box around the circle. This box will have a width and a height of 4. (The diameter in each direction).

Returns:
dimension of body

calculateDimensions

void calculateDimensions()
Used to force a calculation of the body's dimensions. This should only be called if the body's fixtures has been altered.
